widgets_values:
The short-haired Jpaanese girl on the right playfully rubs her cheek against the girl on the left. The Japanese girl on the left, who has her eyes closed, slowly wakes up with a surprised and sweet expression and kissing each other. They said "Hey, sleepyhead... surprise!"
Slow Dolly In combined with a subtle Handheld camera shake to mimic train movement. Soft sunlight flares through the train window, creating a warm and cute atmosphere.
